meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7527.

td.p: Eduardo Sevilla, an 8th through 12th grade math teacher from Vienna, Virginia
Mary Parker, a high school French & English teacher from Rogers, Arkansas
Sara Holub, a high school choir teacher from Green Bay, Wisconsin

tr.td: (Alex: The National Geographic Channel's series on Albert Einstein, which is currently airing.)
EDUCATIONAL FILMS
FIRST NAMES IN THE DICTIONARY
FOREIGN GEOGRAPHIC TERMS
SMALL ENOUGH TO FIT
ON A POSTAGE STAMP
